pr_title: improve the flutter error ids we generate for analytics

timeline.message: improve the flutter error ids we generate for analytics

timeline.bodyText: @InMatrix - can you verify that the IDs here are roughly what we'd want to see for the given errors?
timeline.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: Yes, those IDs look good. I'm not sure if we need to include the package information though. Is it included to disambiguate similar assertions?
replies.author: InMatrix

replies.bodyText: By the package info, do you mean the package:flutter_error_studies/... text in the source errors below? It's just the text that I copied in - it's nice to have real world examples (definitely an issue when I originally wrote this, to have to guess what the error might look like).
replies.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: No, I was referring to "'package:flutter/src/material/reorderable_list.dart': failed assertion: line 123 pos 123: 'children.every((widget w) => w.key != null)'"));" under "all children of this widget must have a key.\n" at line 56. I'm not sure if the extra detail about the specific file in package flutter and assertion position in the file are necessary for analytics .
replies.author: InMatrix
